text: Have you heard of the charity Save the Children?
No. I have never heard of it.
It is a charity that promotes children's rights and helps support kids in developing countries.
That sounds very nobel and moral.
Would you consider donating any of your payment for this HIT to the charity?
I would really need to know more about this charity. I don't just give money to a charity I know nothing about.
I agree with you. I don't normally donate to charities unless I know a lot about them either.
So what do they do exactly? Who would I be helping?
They have US and global programs. It depends on where the kids are that need help. They help with food, medical care, shelter, basic necessities.
Where is the charity based?
The address on the website is Fairfield, CT
Is it a trustworthy charity? Is my money just going into the pockets of the ones running it?
I don't really know the answer to that. If you are interested, they have a website. I need to end this now. Have a nice day!
Thank you. would you like me to donate?
It's really up to you. If you want to, I'm sure the charity would appreciate your help.
I can do that.
How much money would you donate?
Is .50 ok?
That would be great! You are a generous person.
I will do .50 then. TY
Have a great day!
